Posts.EditableText: Hmmm. I just got done with my new game and there was this horrible "TOO MANY" error that wouldn't even let me get back into it with QDK. Luckily, I was able to get into it through notepad and fix it up. But now that I have it back, another problem is occurring. Apparently, the too many thing caused everyone in the game to go mute. I don't even get the default response, but now I get an error message saying the command isn't even known. Is there anyone who might not mind trying to fix this, because I worked on it for four hours and could do nothing. And, while you're at it, you might as well beta test it, too

Posts.EditableText:
Well, as long as you have the version before you got in and tried to fix it... Because you may have loaded it into quest and screwed up some of it.

This sounds as if the dredded "saving with extra {}'s" is still lurking in there somewhere.
